New_Brunswick.Sucker Brook (Lawrence Brook tributary):
Sucker Brook is a tributary of Lawrence Brook in central New Jersey in the United States.


== Course ==
The source of Sucker Brook is several pools located in a housing development at 40°27′40″N 74°27′09″W. It travels in a pipe under Route 130, and then runs between a housing development. It drains into Lawrence Brook at 40°26′58″N 74°26′52″W near Westons Mill Pond, a dammed section of Lawrence Brook.
